para.text: In MDI (Manual Data Input) mode, the operator manually enters the program using the character/numeric keys on the MDI panel. Since the number of blocks that can be input manually is limited to several blocks, this mode is used to perform simple operations. The program entered in this mode is not stored in the NC Memory.
